name: The mine to sentience
description:
The Mine to Sentience

Looking for the ultimate robot experience? We have something to offer! Our little robot from the game The Mine to Sentience has a big dream: to attain sentience. His code tells him that all he has to do is collect gems in the mine. Wait - what?!

Help the robot get deeper and deeper into the mine and collect gems.
But beware of the dangerous earthquakes! We recommend you to take a little shopping tour in the local store to better arm yourself against them.

The game The Mine to Sentience was created within the Ludum Dare 72h Jam 48. Theme: Deeper and deeper 

Controls:
Move - WASD/Arrows
Jetpack - X/K
Parachute - C/L
Pause - Esc

Programming:  Sönke Martens, Dennis Diekmann
Art: Kristina Wassiljew, Sönke Martens
Sound: Dennis Diekmann, Kristina Wassiljew
Music: Kristina Wassiljew
